definition: Yao Silian (557-637), Tang writer and compiler of 梁書|梁书[Liang2 shu1] and 陳書|陈书[Chen2 shu1]
surname Yao
handsome/good-looking
to think/to consider
incorruptible/honest/inexpensive/to investigate (old)/side wall of a traditional Chinese house (old)

sentences.english: The Book of Liang Dynasty, written by Silian Yao, is a comprehensive document on the history of the Liang dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 姚思廉所撰的《梁书》较为系统地记载了梁代的历史。
